constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 161 (Friday, September 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUCHANAN:
H.R. 5268.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H4530]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: Preventing Future Tragedies Act
